subject: Urgent: Meeting with client tomorrow
body: Hi team, we need to discuss the quarterly reports before the client meeting at 2 PM tomorrow. Please prepare your sections and bring the latest analytics data.

subject: 50% Off Sale - Limited Time!
body: Don't miss our biggest sale of the year! Shop now and save on everything. Limited time offer - ends tomorrow!

subject: Project deadline approaching
body: Just a reminder that the website redesign project is due next week. Let me know if you need any help with your tasks.

subject: Invoice #12345 - Payment Due
body: Your invoice for web hosting services is now due. Please process payment within 5 business days to avoid service interruption.

subject: Happy Birthday!
body: Wishing you a wonderful birthday! Hope you have a fantastic day celebrating with family and friends.

subject: Security Alert: Suspicious Login Attempt
body: We detected a login attempt from an unrecognized device. If this wasn't you, please secure your account immediately.
